info.name: Clean up Office365 OWA Message Printout
info.description: Something is wrong with printing from OWA mail on Office365. This helps with the print size and header layout. Long messages won't print in full, but you can use https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/printable-the-print-doctor/ to help with that.

obsolete.message: Microsoft fixed the issue addressed by this style.
